title: Account Froze, Wont come back on?
body: I had recently got a message that someone had attempted to log into my account via another Pc, a message which I think was a system bug because now I hear lots an lots of people on my friends list got the same message. I tried to attempt to reset my password via the client link which did not work. At the time I didn't know that we could go online to reset the password so I emailed explaining I got the message and attempted to reset my password which did not work via client and asked for help. I got a message saying my account would be frozen until the issues was resolved. I emailed them back explaining I had managed to get the password reset and I felt this was sufficient, and so the ticket was closed and put under *solved*, Except my account status has not been returned and the new ticket I made over 24 hours ago has no response. I was wondering if there is another avenue I can go to get my status returned on the account. Thank you.

replies.body: Still waiting on an email or something about my account

We've had a lot of tickets submitted recently, so we'll get back to you as soon as we can. Sit tight and an account specialist will be with you when possible.

Let me know if you have any questions.
